Address.label: Address
Address.value: 9201 EAST DRY CREEK ROAD, CENTENNIAL, Colorado, 80112, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Arrow Electronics is a global distributor of electronics, connecting suppliers of semiconductors, components, and IT solutions to more than 180,000 small and midsize customers in 85 countries. Arrow is the second- largest semiconductor distributor in the world, and the largest for North American chip distribution, partnering with a third of global chipmakers.
